title: Arsenic trioxide
summary: Arsenic trioxide, sold under the brand name Trisenox among others, is an inorganic compound and medication.[2] As an industrial chemical, whose major uses include in the manufacture of wood preservatives, pesticides, and glass.[3] As a medication, it is used to treat a type of cancer known as acute promyelocytic leukemia.[2] For this use it is given by injection into a vein.[2]
